articles.author: Alicia Victoria Lozano
articles.title: American Airlines extends alcohol service suspension after Southwest Airlines assault - NBC News
articles.description: American Airlines is extending its suspension of in-flight alcohol service until September following reports of unruly passengers aboard other airlines.
articles.content:
American Airlines is extending its suspension of in-flight alcohol service until September following reports of unruly passengers aboard other airlines.

articles.title: Kamala Harris blasted for 'enjoy the long weekend' tweet, with no mention of Memorial Day - New York Post
articles.description: Vice President Kamala Harris sent a tweet telling Americans to “enjoy the long weekend” and disregard America’s national day of mourning, Memorial day.
articles.content:
Vice President Kamala Harris drew heat online Saturday for telling Americans to “enjoy the long weekend” — which ends with a national day of mourning.

articles.title: Vaccinating 70% of US adults this summer looks attainable, poll shows - Becker's Hospital Review
articles.description: Sixty-two percent of American adults said they’ve received at least one dose of a COVID-19 vaccine in Kaiser Family Foundation's latest poll, released May 28.
